content.p: From Nobel prize winners to Olympic gold medallists, leading edge scientists, international politicians, journalists, novelists and actresses, Nottinghamâ€™s alumni continue to make significant contributions in their chosen fields all over the world. Born in Nottinghamshire, UK, in 1885, the novelist DH Lawrence is Nottingham's most famous former student. For more information, visit the DH Lawrence website. More noteworthy graduates include: 2003 saw The University of Nottingham gain recognition with two major awards: Nottingham Alumni have also been active in the arts and media.
